85a5('dul ba): lag khang 'dir 'dug// des smras pa// de bzhin pos shig/ da de/ na gnas pa na bsod snyoms las med pa zhig yin pas/ ngos denyi ma re ri phyag dar byas so// 
85a6('dul ba): phyag dang byed pa la ni phan yon lnga yod de/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid se mas dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur
85a7('dul ba): ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyu ro// gang dag gis gtsug lag khang
85a8('dul ba): dbyug pa dang / phyag dar byas pa mthong ba de dag gi khyim bdag de'i drang du song ste/ smras pa/ des thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyeso// ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang nyid der
85b1('dul ba): seng na gtsug lag khang de de bzhin du byab pa dang / phyug dar byas pa mthong nas/ de dad pa skyes te/ nges bsod snyoms pa la ras yug chen bsnyen pa nye dgas thos nas
85b2('dul ba): de rings par song ste smras pa/ bsod snyoms pa gtsug lag khang 'di kho bo'i skal pa yin gyis/ ras yug chen kho bo la byin cig/ bsod snyoms pas bsams pa chags pa
85b3('dul ba): bdag nyid can 'di la gal te bdag gis ma byin yang 'os kyang mthus khyer nas bdag kyang gtsug lag khang nas bskrad par 'gyur ro// snyam nas des de la byin pa'i skabs pa
85b4('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsel pa dang / sa ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dang pa skyes nas dad pa'i lhag par bya ba byas pa de ni
85b5('dul ba): kho na'i yin no// da bar gyi rnyed pa ni nye dga'i yin no// 'jig rten pa ni yon la dga' ba yin pas bdag nyid dang / bu dang / chung ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang / yen dang ldan
85b6('dul ba): pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong dgon pa rnams zas la mgrin du 'bod par byed do// dge slong dben pa pa rnams zas la
85b7('dul ba): khyim rnamasu deng ba dang / ma byin par len pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang nas brkus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bcad la lde mig blangs
85b8('dul ba): la 'deng bar bya'o// ma bin par len pa rnams kyis lde mig byas te brkus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srungs ma'i dge slong gzhag la 'deng bar bya'o// nga la
86a1('dul ba): / bsod snyoms kyis brel pa med par bya'o// ma byin pa len pa rnams kyis dge slong gzhan khrid nga 'ongs nas/ nges sgo phyes zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan
86a2('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rims dang bcas sam rims med ces brda bya'o// gal te rims dang bcas zhes zer na mi dbye'o// 'on de rims mang cas sman dbye bar
86a3('dul ba): gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa pas le ma ltar gnyen pa gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar gnyen pa gzhag par bya'o// 
86a4('dul ba): zhes gsungs pa/ dge slong rnams kyis lo ma mnyen pa ci 'dra ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lo ma ltar mnyen pa ni khaM yin
86a5('dul ba): te de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o// dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyis khyi bcangs pa las mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang / gtsug lag khang sngar
86a6('dul ba): mos brud cing / bshang ba dang gau ci bas ma rung bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas dge slong khyi srel ba'i kun tu spyod pa
86a7('dul ba): chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong khyi srel bas nang par sngar langs la/ mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang gtsug lag khang byung bar bya ste/ sder mos zung pa gang yin pa
86a8('dul ba): nga bsnam par bya'o// bshang ba dang gces pa yang phyag par bya'o// dge slong khyi srel bas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug pa
86b1('dul ba): mi byed na 'gal rabs can du 'gyuraro// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' gtsug lag khang zhig gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur pa dang / ci tsam na de dag dge 'dun rgya
86b2('dul ba): gnas brtan zhig 'ongs nas/ nye dgas bsams pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brjen byed byed pa las go nas brtan gnyis par bya 'am/ bdag gtsug
86b3('dul ba): lag khang gzhan du 'gro'o stsal ste/ gtsug lag khang de nas byung ste/ de gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig tu song ba dang / de'i gnas brnyan gnyis pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa de de
86b4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas brten gyi yin nas des bsams pa/ bdag gi rA da pa 'di na yang der zad la bdag gi rnyed pa de na yang derang zad na spogs med par dge 'dun gyi gnas gan
86b5('dul ba): gyis ci zhig bya zhes/ de sngar rings par rings par gtsug lag khang de nyid du song ba dang / gnas mal byed bskos tsam na gtsug lag khang du phyin nas ngas smras pa/ rgan
86b6('dul ba): rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang bskos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis 'das zin to zhes ma bskos pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhags bzhin
86b7('dul ba): du bstan pa nub par byeng ngam/ ci rgad rims ji lta ba bzhin du gdug lag khang skos shig ces pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
86b8('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig dge 'dun gyi 'am mchod rten gyi bya ba la/ song ba zhig yin na/ de'i gnas lal rgan rings ji lta ba bzhin du bsko bar bya'o// gzhan gyis
87a1('dul ba): / ri gang bab pa bzhin du'o// sa dgas lpags par chags par gtsug lag 'ang gnyis kyi 'dub 'thob par 'gyur snyam nas/ gtsug lag yang gas
87a2('dul ba): su dbyar gnas par ngam bcas te/ ngas dbyar gnas nas/ rnyed pa mnos pa dang / cig nas kyang ma thog cig shos nas kyang ma thob nas/ gnas mil 'ged pa'i dag
87a3('dul ba): rnams la kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des dpar gnas par khas blangs
87a4('dul ba): pas de'i rnyeng pa byin cig/ dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas kyang byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag
87a5('dul ba): khang gnyis ka nas sbyin par mi bya'o// gcig nas/ byin pa dang / dge slong gzhan rnams smod par byed/ gnogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed/ gtsug lag khang ba
87a6('dul ba): kar da bar gnas na/ tso'i phyir gcig nas sbyin pa sa da sa bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis kau nas byed phyed sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gis
87a7('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gnyi su gnas par dam mo bca'// dam bca' bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro// khyim bdag gcig gi gtsug lag khang gnyis brtsig tu bcug ste/ 
87a8('dul ba): cig ni dgon pa pa rnams kyi yi no// cig shos ni grong mtha' pa rnams kyi yin no// khyim bdag de'i kun tu spyod pade bar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dge slong re re la ras
87b1('dul ba): yug chan re re bskon pa yin pas/ da ras yug chen rnams khyer te/ dgon pa pa rnams kyi gdug lag khang du song dang / nye dgas dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang
87b2('dul ba): du rnyed pa 'bul lo zhes thos nas/ des dga' bo la spring pa/ gal te 'di rnyed pa 'bul na skal pa nos shig ces smras nas/ de rengs par dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang
87b3('dul ba): du song ba khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsams pa'o ni gom stangs dang sbyar na dgon pa'i gtsug lag khang derang song gis/ nga ji ltar byas marung snyam pa las re shig grong
87b4('dul ba): mtha' pa'i gtsug lag khang du dul la/ phyis 'dir 'bulo snyam nas/ de phyir log nas ras yug po che brim par brtsams pa na/ dga' bos lag pa bzed pa dang / khyim
87b5('dul ba): bdag gis ras yug po che gcig byin no// yang bzed pa dang / khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phag sa pa khyod la ras yug po che bul lags na/ ci yang bzhed dam
87b6('dul ba): des smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang nye dgas dbyar gnas pas de'i skal pa nod do// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rang
87b7('dul ba): gi lag nas sbyin pa la bsngags pa mdzad pas/ rang gi lag kho na nas 'bul lo// de skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dog// zhe dgas bsams pa/ khyim bdag de ring zhig
87b8('dul ba): thog na grong gi mthar ma song grang snyam du bsams nas/ grong mtha' pa'i gtsug lag khang du song ras dga' bo la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi ras yug po che mnos sam/ 
88a1('dul ba): des dza ltar gyur pa smra so// khyim bdag gis lam gzhan nas dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du song ste/ ras yug po che brims nas song ngo // nye/ 
88a2('dul ba): yang slar dgan pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du brgyugs na/ dzAm na ras yug po che rnams thams zer pa dang / des gtsug lag khang gnyis kyis rnyed pa la lhag
88a3('dul ba): chags pa las rnyed pa las nyams ras/ mya ngani byed cing yi mug nas smre sngags 'don to// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs
88a4('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nye dga' lhag par chags pas ras yug po che las nyams pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
88a5('dul ba): pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'a des 'das pa'i dus na yang / lhag par chags pa sa zas par byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag
88a6('dul ba): sngon byung ba 'bab nu'i ngogs gnyis na gtsug lag khang gzhi ka med/ tsig na ni dge 'dun gyi rnyeng pa'o// cig gshos na ni bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi'o// ci tsam na khyeg
88a7('dul ba): sgra shis pa zhig yid de/ de gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas/ dge 'dun gyi rnyeng pa yod pa'i gtsug lag khang du song na/ de la dge slong kha cig gis lhung bzad kyi lhag ma byin pa dang / di
88a8('dul ba): zos nas bsod sdoms pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ste/ de yang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma thos nas/ dag dgu 'gro'o// ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms pa/ 
88b1('dul ba): rnams la glo bur gri rnyed pa zhig byung nas/ de rnams kyis sngar gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / byings gad+d+ho'i sgra thos nas/ chu rgal bar brtsams te/ nges dbus phyin pa dang / 
88b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa can gyi gtsug lag khang gi gaN+DI yang brdungs nas de spro ba med nas slar log par brtsams pa las/ de chu'i rgyun gyis ring du khyer nas gnyis
88b3('dul ba): las nyams par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyi gad+hA'i sgra shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ don yang 'di lhag par
88b4('dul ba): chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to// de ltar yang lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis lda
88b5('dul ba): par chags par mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du gyuro// sdom la/ 'thab dang nad pa rdzogs pa dang // nab mo'i dus dang ka shi dang // shing dang gsil ma
88b6('dul ba): 'dug gnas dang / cha rnams dang ni bsgo ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis/ dge slong 'a
88b7('dul ba): bkrol 'gyed pa/ 'tshang 'dra bar bgyid pa/ brtson par bgyid pa/ 'gying par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi zhing de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas 'the 'tsham pa'i
88b8('dul ba): slad du bdag cag la gleng par bgyid/ dran par bgyi do zhes thos na// de rnams kyis de dag la/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor dge slong gnyug mar gnas
89a1('dul ba): // pa rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab bkrol byed pa rnams 'ong // nas thos na gnas mal bsgo ba gsum dang gnas mal gzung ba drag bya'o// gnas ma
89a2('dul ba): bsgo ba gsum gang nan/ dgun gyi dang dpyid kyi dang / dbyar bgyi'o// gnas mal gzung na drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang thams cad dang / gtsug lag gi nye 'khor
89a3('dul ba): thams cad dang / khang phran thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba thams cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsgo bar bya'o// gal
89a4('dul ba): gtsug lag khang bskos shig ces zer na/ 'di bskos zin no/ zhes brjod par bya zhing / gtsug lag khang gi nyi 'khor skos shig zhe na/ 'di yang bskos zin no// khang
89a5('dul ba): bran skos shig can 'di yang bskos zin// khang phran gyi nye' khor skos shig can 'di yang bskos zi na// ku na dga' ra ba skos shig ca na// 'di yang bskos zan
89a6('dul ba): no// kun dga' ra ba'i nye bar bskos shig can 'di yang bskos zin te zhes brjod par bya'o// de rnams gnas ming nga mi gnas na/ gang la nyes pa skyed par 'gyur/  nas
89a7('dul ba): bang ba rnams med/ phyir rgol ba rnams med / ma mdza' ba rnams med nas/ de 'og tu rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsgo bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
89a8('dul ba): rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsgo bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong nad pa gcig cig yod pa debs ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas
89b1('dul ba): rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du do gnas 'ang bskos te/ de ni thams cad pas gzhon pas de'i gnas khang gzhan ni mthong bo// dge sbyong des de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
89b2('dul ba): gnas khang 'di kho bo'i yin par bskos kyis byung shig/ des smras pa/ bdag bro 'tshal bas nam ses pa na'o// dge slong de gtum po zhog pas nges phyung nas/ dang rar
89b3('dul ba): gan go// ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang la lte bar 'dod pa lhags pa de rnams kyis/ dge slong de mthong nas de rnams kyis spras pa/ 'phags pa dag
89b4('dul ba): ci dge slong dgum lags sam/ bzhin bzangs dag 'di shi ba ni ma yino// 'o na ci'i phyir 'dir bzhag/ 'di bas ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/ 'di'i gnas
89b5('dul ba): khang nga de'i yin par bskos pa dang / des 'di phyung nas 'dir dag nago// 'phags pa dag bdag cag khyim pa lags kyang nad pa rje su bsrung ba'i phyir/ khyim nas mi 'byi
89b6('dul ba): na khyed cag rab tu byung la/ ston pa yang thugs rje can yin na/ da ji ltar nad pa phyir 'ben par byed ces nga rnams spod pa ra byed gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skab
89b7('dul ba): de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsel ba dang / byung ba 'di laM bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ dge slong nang po la gzhi spang
89b8('dul ba): ba sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong na dpal gzhi spang ba smin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas mjal to zhes byas nas/ cang mi smra bar 'dag go// 
90a1('dul ba): ci tsam na zhag drug gam bdun na gnas mal 'ged par 'gyur ba na/ rkang pa rma byung ba ltar byas te/ gos kyis dkris nas 'dug pa dang / gnas
90a2('dul ba): khang 'geng pa'i dge slong rnams kyis nad pa yin snyam nas de'i gnas mal bskos so// de gnas mal bskos zin nas/ rma'i g.yogs ma bor te 'dug go// nad pa la lnga
90a3('dul ba): ba'i dge slong rnams kyis de la dris pa/ cig nas brtan zhabs snyun sos sam/ de sbas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o zhes bka' ma phul
90a4('dul ba): dam tsa kho bo'i nang rtag pa 'gyur ram/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan myur du sos par gyur pa/ na bar smra ni ma btab grang / ngas smras pa/ kho bo gnas kha
90a5('dul ba): sgo drung du gzhag par 'dod dam ci/ dge slong don nyung ba rnam sa slong bar byed gzhogs 'phyas byed kha zer ba re byed de/ de ltar dge slong dag mi na bzhin du gnas
90a6('dul ba): khang spang ba rang gir byed pa ci tha tshig ces pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
90a7('dul ba): dge slong de lta bas na sgyu 'debs pa'i nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par mi bya zhing / des rang gir yang mi bya'o// rang gir byed na 'gal tshabs tsan du 'gyuraro// lnga tshan rnams kyis bsdu
90a8('dul ba): ba'i sdom ni// mdun 'ang dang rang khrims dang // ma chags pa dang bzhin du// snang ba skyes dang byung ba dang / khar du gcod dang de bzhin du// phyi mar byas pa ltung ba ste// bsdus pa'i sdom
90b1('dul ba): du bsdus pa yin// bar sdom ni/ mdun du bya dang gzhan dang yang // nad dang gzhan rnams ngag dang ni// sems can mang po ban bya ba// lnga mtshan dag ni dang po yin// bcom ldan
90b2('dul ba): 'das kyis/ lha dang mi rnams la mdo sde dang ma mo gzhag go// klu rnams la ni mdo sde'o// 'dul ba ni zab pa zab par snang ba mthong bar dka' ba/ khong nga chud par dka' ba/ dag
90b3('dul ba): pa mang ba/ 'jig rten gyi sbed pa dang 'thun pa yin na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'dul ba zab pa nyid dang / dgongs pa mang pa nyid dang / 'jig rten gyi spong po dang 'thun pa nyid yin
90b4('dul ba): pas 'don par mi spro'o// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bstan pa'i yan lag gang zhig yongs nyams pa de'o bsngags pa lhag par
90b5('dul ba): brjod par mdzad pa yin pas/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon
90b6('dul ba): lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'khor ba nis mdun du bdar ba yin/ gdams ngag dang rje su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las pa dang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
90b7('dul ba): ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang gi mdzod bsrung ba yin/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan rnams kyi spyi bo la 'dug pa yin/ dam pa'i chos gnas
90b8('dul ba): par bya ba'i phyir dang / bslab pa'i ched kyi phyir skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde par zhugs pa yino// bar sdom ni/ bdag nyid khrims ldan mngon par bsdu
91a1('dul ba): 'gyod pa dang ni bag tsha med// chos dang 'thun pas byed pa ste// lnga mtshan gnyis pa yin par bshad// gzhan yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la
91a2('dul ba): phan yon lnga yod de// lnga gang zhe na 'di'i rang gi tshul khrims kyi phung pos legs par bsrungs shing legs par sbas pa yin/ 'khor bzhis mngon sum du bskul bar
91a3('dul ba): bya ba yin/ gang zag 'gyod pa skyes pa rnams kyi ston par gyur pa yin/ dge 'dun gyi nang na bag tsha ba med pas gnas pa yin/ chos dang 'thun pas phyir rgol ba tshar ga
91a4('dul ba): pa yin no// bar sdom ni/ ma 'ongs don dngangs pa dang // bslab pa yin ni gzhi dag dang // snang ba dag ni gnyis po nyid// lnga tshan dag ni gsum po yin// gzhan yang
91a5('dul ba): gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ don ma 'dres par srel ba yin/ don rnam par gtan la dbab par bya ba la shin tu
91a6('dul ba): nges pa yin/ de'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams legs par gzung ba yin/ sems kyi snang ba skyes pas mang du gnas pa yin/ skye bo phyi ma rnams kyi snang ba byed pa yin/ 
91a7('dul ba): sdom na// snang ba gsal ba 'od dang ni// sems las chung dang mi stong pa'o// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe ni/ phyogs gang nag
91a8('dul ba): zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa gnas pa'i phyogs dengs snang ba skyes pa dang gsal ba skyes pa dang / 'od skyes par mthong / phyogs derang thugs khral chung ngur gnas/ phyogs dngas
91b1('dul ba): stong pa ma yin par mthong ngo // sdom ni/ byung dang de nas bcas pa dang / rjesu bcas dang de bzhin du// bkag dang rje su gnang ba ni// lnga tshan lnga par byas pa'o// gzhan yang
91b2('dul ba): gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ byung ba shes/ bcas pa shes/ rje su bcas pa shes/ bkag pa shes/ rjesu gnang ba shes pa yino// sdom ni// 
91b3('dul ba): bar chad bar chad ma yin dang // gdamus ngag dang ni rjes bstan dang / slob ma'i mthu ni yod pa ste// lnga tshan drug pa dag tu bshad// gzhan yang gang zag 'dal ba 'dzin pa la
91b4('dul ba): phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bar du gtso nga ba rnams shes/ bar du gcod pa ma yin pa rnams shes/ 'doms par byed/ rjesu ston par byed/ lhan cig gan
91b5('dul ba): pa dang nye gnas rnams kyi gnas 'char 'jug naso// / sdom ni/ ltung ba dang ni ltung ba mir// lci dang yang dang de bzhin du// so sor bar pa rgyas par yang // gdon pa dag ni
91b6('dul ba): lnga tshan yin// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la bar yin lnga yed de/ lnga gang zhe na/ ltung ba byung ba shes/ ltung ba byung ba shes/ lci ba shes/ yang ba shes shing so sor thar
91b7('dul ba): pa'i mdo gdor pa la rgyas par zhugs pa yi no// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa dang / dge slong gnas brdar gnas brtar rnams/ spro ba dang bcas
91b8('dul ba): pas 'dal ba gdon par brtsam so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dul 'i gling gzhi dang byang ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur na/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas bca
92a1('dul ba): rnams 'dul ba kun chub par byed par 'gyuro// snyam ste/ gus pas bstan par brtsams pas/ de lus skyob bseng ba seng por gyur cing / ring
92a2('dul ba): dang nyam chub pa dang / nabs nyam dmas par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen
92a3('dul ba): par mi rmed/ dus su rmed kyi dus las yol bar mi rmeng / don dang ldan pa rmed kyi don dang mi ldan pa mi rmed pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang lda
92a4('dul ba): pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu len gyis bzlog par mdzad pa yin// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de/ dang ldan par chung ba la dus mkhyen pas sangs rgya
92a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong nye bar 'a khor lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing / ring pa
92a6('dul ba): dang nyam chung ba dang na bas nyams dpas par gyur/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnam
92a7('dul ba): kyis de thos nas/ spro ba dang bcas pas/ 'dal ba gdon par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brdar rnam 'dal ba kun chub pa
92a8('dul ba): 'gyur ro// zhes gus pas bstan pa brtsams te/ des na de lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing ring pab dang zhar chung ba dang bro 'tshal bas nyam ngams par gyu rol pos
92b1('dul ba): byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas lung 'bog pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ lung 'bogs
92b2('dul ba): pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam bzhir lung 'bogs par bya ste/ 'chag pa dang 'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba na'o// lung nong ba'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam pa
92b3('dul ba): gsum gyis lung nod par bya ste/ gal te lung 'bog pa'i dge slong 'chag par lung nod pa'i dge slong 'ongs la/ gsar bu zhig pa yin na des phyag byas la
92b4('dul ba): khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/ lus btud de sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri zhing lung mnod par bya'o// ji ste ches rgan pa zhig yin
92b5('dul ba): na des khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/ lus bad de sems drag pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri zhing lung mnod par bya'o// ji ste 'greng
92b6('dul ba): ba na 'ongs la gsar bu zhig yin pa des phyag byas la/ khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/ stan ches dma' ba la cog tsog por 'dug la/ sems drang pos gus
92b7('dul ba): pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o// ji ste rgan pa zhig yin na/  khams snyoms sam zhes dris la/ lus bdud nas sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pa sol
92b8('dul ba): mnor par bya'o// 'greng ba la ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dag pa dang nyal ba la yang sbar bar bya'o// lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis shin tu goms pa dang / legs par byang
93a1('dul ba): ba dang / the tsom med par byas nas/ lung dbog par bya'o// lung nod pas kyang shin tu byang ba dang / shin tu zin pa dang / the tsom med par byas nas
93a2('dul ba): lung mnod par bya'o// lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong dang lung nod pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par
93a3('dul ba): mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// drug sde'i dge slong rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba ni/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu nub me byin nas/ de rnams 'grogs bshes ji
93a4('dul ba): ba bzhin du/ dge slong rnams kyis del sor bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dug ste ci byid/ gnas mal bsre ba bos shig/ rangag gis smra
93a5('dul ba): pa tsa dgas/ gnas mal skor gzhug mod/ de rnams kyis smra sa pa/ gnas mal yod kyis bde bar nyol cig dang / nam nangs nas bgo'o// de rnams kyis
93a6('dul ba): kun nas bkris pas sbas pa/ ci khyed cag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed ngam/ gal te khyed la 'gyed pa yong na/ rgar rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas
93a7('dul ba): mel skos shig/ de rnams kha stobs can yin pas gnas mal sko ba phreng nas gnas mal bskos pa dang / drug sde de rnams kyis rgan rims bzhin du gnas
93a8('dul ba): mal mnos te 'alo// ji tsam gzhon rims kyi bar du sko ba de'i bar du nam nang so// drug sde rnams myur bskur bar khengs te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal
93b1('dul ba): bsdus shig 'ang // dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis nub gcig gi phyir/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' dag nub mo mtho tsam 'am
93b2('dul ba): ma'o// phreng cag 'di nyid du 'dug shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nyi dag mnyan yod du 'dong ngo // 'di dag ni rlung nang can yino ces byas nas dong ba'i
93b3('dul ba): skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lnga bas na/ nub ma
93b4('dul ba): gnas mal bsgo bar mi bya'o// gal te nub me lhags na 'grogs bshes ci lta ba bzhin du so sor ngal ser ga zhug par bya'o// yul zhig nas dge slong mchod
93b5('dul ba): rten la phyag byed pa zhig mnyan yod 'ongs de de'i spyod yul la mi mkhas pas nang par sngar langs te/ bco mi ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ bcom ldan
93b6('dul ba): 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ da bsod snyems spyod pa dro rab tu
93b7('dul ba): nas de nyid du ra ba zhig gi drung du 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba bya bar brtsam so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang mchod rten la phag 'tshal zhing lam de nas song ba las
93b8('dul ba): des de mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa kun nas mdzes pa'i bstan pa las rab tu byung ba yin na mi rigs pa mdzad dam ci/ des spros pa/ tshe dang ldan pa drol bab tu nye ba ma
94a1('dul ba): mthong ngam 'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod// des smras pa/ khyod ci'i slad du bdag gi khyim du mi byon// khyod kyi ming sa/ mgon med zas sbyin no// 
94a2('dul ba): kho bos mdo sde de dang de rnams las khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin zhes thos pa zhig yod kyi khyod kyang mi shes la khyim yang mi sheso// khyim bdag mgon
94a3('dul ba): med zas sprin gyis bsams pa/ dge slong 'di ni lam ring po nas 'ongs la rgyas mi shes pa zhig yin te/ gdon mi za bar bdag kyang mi shes la bdag gi khyim
94a4('dul ba): yang mi shos kyis/ 'di lta bu la ji ltar byas na rung ba/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ gang yang mnyan yeng nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gar+tha
94a5('dul ba): gartsig par bya'i'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mo 'i byin no sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs
94a6('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong glo bur pa snang
94a7('dul ba): yul ma 'tshal ba zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro yol tu nye nas ra ba zhig gi drung du g.yor zas kyi bgyi ba bgyid/ ma dad pa rnams yan lag 'dis 'phags pa rnams
94a8('dul ba): la smod par 'gyuraro// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis gang ying sa nyas yong nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas gtsug par bgyi
94b1('dul ba): ste/ gang zhig gang du dro bab pa de der bsod snyoms longs spyad par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de lta bas na rje su gnang gis brtsigs shig/ des gangs
94b2('dul ba): mnyan yod nas/ rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du gasti gnas dag brtsigs nas dge slong gang zhig gad da dro bab pa de de zas kyi bya ba byed// dge slong gzhan dag chus phongs par
94b3('dul ba): gyur nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dang khrod pa brkos nas/ tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum gyis shing rta bkang ste btab pas/ chu da ro pur sum tshogs par
94b4('dul ba): gyur to// zhes 'jig rten thams cad grags pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas lhags pas/ dge slong rnams kyis bgags pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa rnams kyis
94b5('dul ba): sbas pa/ 'phags pa khyed cag la bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis// chab 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong khyed 'gog par mdzad
94b6('dul ba): dam zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgag par mi bya'o// bud med dge slong rnams
94b7('dul ba): la chu slong ba na dge slong rnams kyis ma byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med ni kun nas zhags pa ste/ bdud kyi
94b8('dul ba): 'ching ba yin no zhes gsungs pas/ dge slong rnams bud med la na smin par byed pa na chags por gyur to// ci tsam na bud med byad bzhin dang lang tsos rgyags pa zhig / 
95a1('dul ba): slong gzhon nu zhig la shin tu chags pas de la chu bslangs pa dang / de yang de la chags pas/ bcings pa'i sems kyis slar bzlog kyang
95a2('dul ba): rgyun ma bcad par bsgugs te/ de yang de la rtog bzhi ni 'thungs pa las na de glor song nas shi'o// don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phas byed/ kha
95a3('dul ba): zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bud med gang zhig ma
95a4('dul ba): pas bcings pa'i sems kyis/ dge slong la chu slong ba de la ring gis sbyin par mi bya'o// bud med la chu rgyun ma chad par sbyin par mi bya zhing snyam pa khong la 'thung
95a5('dul ba): ces bsgol// skabs skabasu bcad cing blugs par bya'o// gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can de 'gyu ro// 'dul ba gzhi// 
95a6('dul ba): bam po don bdun pa// de'i tshe gang dag bsod snyoms kyi thog ma/ rgyal bu rgyal bad kyi tshal du dbul ba rnams kyis de nyid du dbul bar brtsams pa drug snga rnams
95a7('dul ba): kyis thos nas de rnams bsti gnas dong ste 'dag nas/ bsod snyoms kyi thog mar khyor te 'ong ba gang yin pa de la rmas te gal te'o thug yin na ni lhung bzed zad par bde/ 
95a8('dul ba): tsaM ste nu thug yin na ni rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ngage 'angan dang / mthu chen po'i dge 'dun la phul cig ces smra'o// de bzhin du hwags kyi bca' ba la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya ste/ 
95b1('dul ba): den nyung ba'i dge slong rnams spong bar byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs pa/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la
95b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o// kha brngam byed na 'gal tshabs nga 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis
95b3('dul ba): gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong kha cig dgos pa zhig la gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ste/ de rnams ngar phyin pa na dro la bab kyang
95b4('dul ba): 'gyod pas longs ma sprad pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chang

95b7('dul ba): spong ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang snga mar de blangs la de

96a1('dul ba): bcom ldas 'angs yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu ning gshegs pa na ri nag po la gshegs// de'i tshe ri nag po la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang rab so gnyis
96a2('dul ba): te/ de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dag 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs shing 'dir gshegs par 'gyuro// zhes thos so// thos
96a3('dul ba): kyang bsams pa/ ston pa'i spyan sngar dge slong tsha med pa dang / 'dzem pa med pa rnams kyis bdag cag la gleng bar byed dran par byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis bcam
96a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang chen po gcig ma gtogs pa dge slong rnams las brtsams te/ ga nas mal bsgo ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba yang dag pa/ 
96a5('dul ba): gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun gyi dang dpyid kyi dang dbyar bgyi'o// gnas mal gzu nga ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang thams cad dang / gtsu
96a6('dul ba): lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang / khang phrin thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsgo bar bya'o// gal te gdug
96a7('dul ba): lag khang sgos shig ces smras pa dang 'di bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing kha phran skos shig can 'di yang bskos zin no// gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor bskos shig can
96a8('dul ba): 'di yang bskos zin no// kha'i phran gyi nye 'khor bsres shig ce na 'di yang bskos zi no// kun dga' ra ba skos shig cen 'di yang bskos zi no// kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos
96b1('dul ba): shig can 'di yang bskos zino zhes brjod par bya ste/ de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na ngo tsha med pa/ 'jam pa med par bdag cag la gleng bar mi 'gyur// snyam nas
96b2('dul ba): de gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba dag byaso// ci tsam na bcom ldan 'das ri nag po la gshegs na de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das
96b3('dul ba): kyi gtsug lag khang ni snga nas bsdogs zin to// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal dang / gtsug lag khang skos shig/ de gnyis kyis
96b4('dul ba): smras pa/ gtsug lag khang sngar bskos zin no// khang phran skos shig/ de yang bskos zin no// gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig nga yang ba
96b5('dul ba): zin no// khang phran gyi nye 'khor skes shig de yang bsgos zin no// kun dga' ra ba skos shig de yang bskos zi no// kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skyes shig de
96b6('dul ba): yang bskos zi no// gang gi phyir de gnyis kyis gnas thams cad ma bskos pa dang / de nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po byung ngo // sangs rgyas bcor
96b7('dul ba): ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par mi rmed/ dus su rmod kyi dus las yol bar mi rjod/ ngos dang ldan pa rmad kyi
96b8('dul ba): don dang mi ldan pa mi rmed pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don dang ldan pa ma yin po rmed pa la chu lon gyis bzlog par mdzad pa yino// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
97a1('dul ba): rnams don dang ldan pa rmad pa ngal dus mkhyen pa yin pas/ sangs bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo kun
97a2('dul ba): dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen por grags pa 'di ci zhig yin/ des gsol pa/ dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis kyis gnas
97a3('dul ba): mal bsgo ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug bgyes nas/ dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal ma thob par gyur te/ ngas na kun dpa' ra ba'i nang na/ skye bo'i cho ga
97a4('dul ba): chen po'i sgra mthon pa dang / sgra chen po 'di grags lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas 'thab bkrol byed pa'i dge slong rnams la dgongs nas
97a5('dul ba): gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug mdzad kyi/ rang bzhin du gnas pa la ni ma yin pas/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i

97a7('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ grong med pa'i dgon pa zhig tu nub mo dgongs btab bo// drug sde rnams kyis bcom
97a8('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi phyir shing bzang po zhig bzhag nas/ shing bzang po gzhan ni rang rang gis bzung ngo // dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis ni/ shing long stong dag
97b1('dul ba): thob bo// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag gzhi dang chas te bsu nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas
97b2('dul ba): nas/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la brtags na/ ji tsam na drug sde rnams ni shing bzang po dag gi drung gnas la gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi
97b3('dul ba): ni shing khong stong rnams mthong nas/ des mjal to zhes byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la ma
97b4('dul ba): zhes phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ko sa la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

97b6('dul ba): dngos po gang lags pa de ni bdog gi lags la/ lhag ma rnams las ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du/ mchis brang dang gzhon nu dang blon po dang khrom gyi ru ba rnams kyi lag
97b7('dul ba): so tra bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags/ 'phags pa go'u din+ya dang shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu dang 'od bsrung dang kun dga' bo dang nam gru
97b8('dul ba): la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams ni/ zhugs shing khong stong rnams kyi drung na mchis la/ drug sde rnams kyi ni zhugs shing bzang chas lags kyis/ kye ma bcom ldan ci
98a1('dul ba): thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste zhugs shing la yang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin gyi/ bca' ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kas la

98a3('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stan las langs nas so // byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na shing

98b1('dul ba): ni dbang bar bya'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bsgos pa ni dbang bar mi bya'o// lnga gang 'a na/ 'dun pas ma

98b3('dul ba): 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang bsko bar me bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te/ gar+b+ha
98b4('dul ba): la dris pa'i rigs gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsko la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad tshegs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / re shig thog ma spro bar bya ste
98b5('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bya ba khong dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang bsgo ba ra spro 'am/ de gal te spro bar gyur na de spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de dge slong gcig gis gsol
98b6('dul ba): babs te las bya'o// dge 'ang ni btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsug lag khang sko ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko ba spron
98b7('dul ba): gal te dge 'dun gyi ngas la bab cing bzod ra/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang skye bar bas
98b8('dul ba): ba mdzad do// 'od ni gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsar da gsol/ gtsug lag khang slob dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi gdug lag pa
99a1('dul ba): sko bar spro nas 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos na/ ro dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di nas
99a2('dul ba): bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sgo bar bsgo bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod tsang gnang nas
99a3('dul ba): 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di nas bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas rang bzhin du 'dzin to// gtsug lag khang 'ged pa dza
99a4('dul ba): ba bzhin du zas la sko ba dang thugs pa 'drim pa dang / bag chos 'drim pa dang / bran tshegs 'drim pa dang / snod dpyad pa 'dreb pa dang / gos sbeng ba dang / gos 'gang
99a5('dul ba): pa dang / dbyer gyi ras chen sbeng ba dang / dbyar gyi ras chen 'ged pa dang // mngag gzhag pa dang / mdzes chos pa ya deng bzhin te/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong
99a6('dul ba): ma bskos pa ni bsgo bar mi bya'o// bskos par 'byung bar bya'o// lnga ga bzhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'a gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'grib dang / 'jig
99a7('dul ba): pas 'gro ba dang / mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa mi shes te/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes chos par ma bskos pa ni bsgo bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya
99a8('dul ba): yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes ros par ma bskos pa ni bsre bar bya'o// bsgos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / ne sdang gis
99b1('dul ba): mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes chos
99b2('dul ba): par ma bskos pa ri bsgo bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// gtsug lag khang dang zas 'geng dang // thug pa 'dri ma dang bag chos dang // phran tshogs sdong byang
99b3('dul ba): sbed pa dang // chos gos gnyis dang de bzhin nga // dbar gyi ras chen sbeng ba dang // 'geng ba dag dang mngag gzhag dang // de bzhin du ni mdzes chos te// gang zag bcu
99b4('dul ba): gnyis yin par bshad// gnas mal gyi gzhi rdzogaso s+ho// // rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/ 'thab dang 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang / rtsa ba
99b5('dul ba): gang dang dge ba dang // 'gyed pa yin la rtsod min dang // 'gyed pa ngas ni zhi ba dang // 'gyed pa mngon sum zhi ba dang / chub shing dag ni blangs pa yis/ gdapas ngag
99b6('dul ba): med pa mngon sum dang // dran dang ma mos 'dul 'os dang // de yi ngo bo tshal gzhug dang // rtswa bkram lta bur 'ong ba yis// dge 'dun dag ni 'thun pa yis// de bzhin bya sa
99b7('dul ba): rtsod pa ri// nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes// drang srong chen pos rab tu gsungs// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi ni gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// 
99b8('dul ba): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rnams bden pa la bkod pa de'i tshe/ de rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir/ des gsum 'dong bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
100a1('dul ba): kyang nga rnams la yang dang yang ngachos 'chad par mdzad do// rgyal po zas gtsang gi kun tu spong ba ni shAkya'i rigs kyis bsnyeran nas/ bcom lda
100a2('dul ba): 'das la blta ba'i phyir/ ngas gsum du 'gro bar byed do// ci tsam ngas gzhan zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phra gang ma'i gung la ba'ags ras spang ma'i spyang
100a3('dul ba): dngas ma lta bu'i chos bshad pa ri/ 'khor brgya phrag da ma dang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan pa bsnun pa'i ris nyan par byed do// rgyal po zas
100a4('dul ba): gtsang yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ rgyal po'i 'byo ra ba chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor ras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman snga
100a5('dul ba): seng ste/ nges ros mnyan nas song ngo // de nas shwA kye ming chen gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos mnyan de dad pa skyes nas rang gi khyim nga song sA smra
100a6('dul ba): kye ma'i sangs rgyas/ kye ma'o chos/ kye ma'i dge 'dun/ sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no// ming chen gyi dang ba dam pas smras pa/ rje
100a7('dul ba): de tsa lags/ nges smras pa/ dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas srog rags brgya stong brag
100a8('dul ba): mas byung par chen po rdog so// des smras pa/ rje'i sras sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de mad de/ sangs
100b1('dul ba): blang ba mi byed cag kho na la 'bras bu dang bcas lags kyis/ bdag cag la ni ma lag so// ci'i phyir 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das jig rten du byung ba ni/ smras pa rnams
100b2('dul ba): kyi phyir lags so// bud med rnams kyi phyir ni ma lagaso// des smras pa/ bzangs mo do skad ma smra shig/ bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang
100b3('dul ba): thugs brtse ba yin gyis song shig dang / khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas chos thos par 'gyur ro// nges smras pa/ lha shAkya'i tshogs kyis
100b4('dul ba): bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus sum du bzhud la/ lha'i mdun de mngon sum du bdag gis chos mnyan pa g.yang tshe lag so// 'di ltar gal
100b5('dul ba): delha lnga dro lan cig bzhud na bdag gis kyang slar snga dro bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan par ba gyi'o// shAkya ming chen gyis bsams pa/ lnga la gsol gyis
100b6('dul ba): 'gro'o// snum pa las yang bsam pa rang gi chung ma'i ched la lha la gsol ba byed ni mi bod kyis/ lha ni skye dga'i bdag mo chen mo la bkur bsti mang nga byed de/ de'i tsha
100b7('dul ba): nyan par 'gyur bas/ de la don 'di rig par bya'o snyam nas/ de skyes dgra'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mi chen mo re'ung mi
100b8('dul ba): don de smras pa dang / nges smras pa dang / bka' bzhin tshal lnga lo gsel ba bgyi'o// de nas shAkya ming chen khyim nga song nas shAkya rnams kyi rung ma rnams la smras par
101a1('dul ba): de nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma dang / gzhan dag gi chung ma rnams skyes dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gang na ba der song ste byin nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo
101a2('dul ba): chen mo go'u ta mi la 'di skad ces smraso// go'u ta mi mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du snyan po brnyan pa'i chos
101a3('dul ba): sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan to zhes thos nas/ 
101a4('dul ba): bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos de thos par 'tshal gyis// bdag cag gi phyir lha la ci nas kyang lde ni snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhad la bdag
101a5('dul ba): cag kyang slad dro mchi bar gsol ba mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ pu nu mo dag khyod kyis sems bskyed pa legs te// rgyal po zas gtsang la brtag gis skad
101a6('dul ba): cig sdod cig/ de nas ske dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi rgyal po zas gtsang ga nai ba dar song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smraso// lha mkhyen par
101a7('dul ba): mdzod cig/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhags nas/ snyan pa snyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya
101a8('dul ba): brag dam dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das la rlan pa rnyen pa'i chos nyan no zhes thos/ shAkya'i mchis brang rnams kyis kyang nga skad thos nas/ de rnams
101b1('dul ba): chos nyan par 'tshal na/ lha ni snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gshegs pa'i rig so// bdag gis kyang shAkya'i mchis blangs rnams deng ngo / bcom ldan
101b2('dul ba): 'das kyis sman sngar spyad dro mchi bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ snga dro ni de rnams sngam pa'i bgyi ba dag bgyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchi ba'i
101b3('dul ba): skabs ma mchis so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang gi tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo rin mo go'ata mis tshig smras pa/ de'i tshe lus kyi spu zing zhes bya
101b4('dul ba): nas langs te/ re shig ske dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i tshig gi lan ma byin pa de'i bar du mi dag pa yin pas des mgo bos btud nas smras pa go'u ta mi bka' bzhin
101b5('dul ba): 'chal/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag po chen po go'u ta mi shAkya'i chung ma lnga brgyas yongasu bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i
101b6('dul ba): phyir n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' bar song // ji tsam na shAkya'i ming chen gyi chung ma yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ de na lhan cig song ste/ gzugs dang lang
101b7('dul ba): dang ldan zhing rgyani thams cad kyis brgyan pas/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dag chags pa skye bar zhugs pa de/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong nas/ smras pa
101b8('dul ba): sring mo re shig khyod kyis rang bzhin gyi gzugs nyid kyang bzang mo blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin no// rkyen thams cad kyis brgyan pa lha mos kyang ci dgos/ khang
102a1('dul ba): rgyar gyis brgyan te 'dir 'ong ba gang yin pa de ni/ ma legs pa zhig byas te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba
102a2('dul ba): kho na yang yino zhes de la de skad ces smras pa dang / ngo tsha ba snying la phog pas spyi bo smras nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/ rgyan rnams dkrol nas sems khongs su
102a3('dul ba): chud cing 'dug pa las/ de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo skyed ma zhes bya ba dang / de lhon cig chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pas des de la bos te smras pa/ bskyed ma song la rgyas
102a4('dul ba): 'di dag khyim du gzhog la shog shig/ de rings par song nas des khyim du bzhag ste slar 'ongaso// de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta ma 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom
102a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos bshad pa mdzad do// ches bshad pa
102a6('dul ba): mdzad pa de'i tshe/ ji tsam na shAkya'i bu mo zhig mgul pa na mu tig gi do shal btags pa la myur ba myur bar lta zhing lag pas nom par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
102a7('dul ba): mi rtag pa dang / ldan pa'i chos bshad par brtsam so// 'on kyang des chos la mi gtod kyi mu tig go do shal kho na la rtog par byed do// ming chen gyi rlung ma dam pas/ 
102a8('dul ba): bu mo mgul pan mu tig ga nga la rtag pa la myur ba myur bar rtog par byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'on mongs 'di 'du byed rnapas 'di ltar mi rngag
102b1('dul ba): bar bshad na mu tig gi do shal 'di la lhag par chags te myur ba myur bar rtag tu ci yod/ gal te bdag gi mu tig gi phreng ba mthong na 'di'i rgyags pa thams cad dang
102b2('dul ba): bral bar 'gyur ro// snyam du bsams nas/ mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo bskyed ma la smras pa/ bskyed ma song la kho mo'i mu tig gi do shal myur du khyer te sho shig/ de chos nya
102b3('dul ba): pa la sems bsdus pas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hud 'di 'dra ba'i chos 'chad na/ bdag rje mos mngags pas chos kyi bar chid byung bar gyur te/ mngon bran gyi
102b4('dul ba): rang bzhin du gyur pa ni re sdug snyam du bsems nas/ sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde bas gdungs pas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang yang sdig pas de ring
102b5('dul ba): rgyal zhal blta ba dang // bde gshegs zhal nas dri med chos mnyan mi 'thob pa// bran mangs zhal dbang sdug bsnga la mang po tha chad de// bdag gi mtsho ba sngor byas
102b6('dul ba): las kyis thob pa ngan// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bu mo bskyed ma 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin mod kyis
102b7('dul ba): cung zhig yod pas 'di 'khor ba'i brtson ra nas dbyung bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni 'gro ba la// dge ma skye ba byung ba ni// 'jig pa yin par bsams nas
102b8('dul ba): su ngas gsungs pa yi dge ba la// brtson 'grus bskyod nas mnyan par bya// zhes bris nas byin no// de nas bu mo bskyed ma dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / rang ba dang ming
103a1('dul ba): bde ba skyes nas/ tshig su bcad pas smras bzhin sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kho nas song ba dang / las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang
103a2('dul ba): chung mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba yin pas/ tshe cung zhig yod pa'i las tshogs pa rnyed de/ ba dras ma na
103a3('dul ba): gis bsad do// de sangs rgyas la sems mngon par dad par byas te shi bas/ sing ga la'i gling du sing ga la'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur te/ gang
103a4('dul ba): nam la cing mtshams sbar ba de kho na'i nyin par mu tig gi tshar pa bab po/ rgyal pos bltas mkhan rnams bkug ste/ spras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di
103a5('dul ba): sems can zhig btsun mo'i lhumasu zhugs pa'i de'i mthu lag so// ci tsam na mngal gyi smin par bya ba'i phyir te/ sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang ma grags cing
103a6('dul ba): bar grang ba'i ye byad dang / dri ba na dri bo'o ye byad dang / smin pas stan pa'i kha zas ha cang la ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang sbyar ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang lan tshwa can ma yin pa dang
103a7('dul ba): ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang rtsub pa ma yin pa dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa dang / kha ba skur ba dang / la ni tshwa dang / mngar ba dang rtsub pa dang / bska ba rnams spangs
103a8('dul ba): pa'i kha zas kyi bsnyen bkur byed cing de shal dang se mo des lus brgyan nas/ lha'i bu mo dga' tshal ni rgyu ba bzhin du khri dang khri nas/ khri'u nas khri'ur 'gro zhing / 'og gis
103b1('dul ba): la 'bab par mi byed do// nga zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/ gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyan par
103b2('dul ba): yang mu tig gi char babs nas/ rgyal pos bsams pa/ 'di ji ltar bu mo'i mthus mu tig gi char bab pa ni/ de nyid kyi mu tig tu 'gyu ro zhes des de nyid la byin no// de nas
103b3('dul ba): ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dog par byed do// blong po rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi
103b4('dul ba): 'dir mthus mu tig gi char bab pas de bas na bu mo'i mingon tog can zhes gdag so// zhes de'i ming du mu tig can zhes bya bar btags te/ bu mo mu tig can ma
103b5('dul ba): ma brgyad la gtad de/ pang na 'tsho ba'i gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'byi ba'i me pa gnyis dang / rtse 'grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/ 
103b6('dul ba): nga ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying po dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso blo dag gis srid par byed/ skyed par byed cing rdzing
103b7('dul ba): na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do// de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa'i tshe rang gi rigs dang 'thun pa'i spyod pa dang / gnas pas rgyal po nang bcas pas lhag
103b8('dul ba): bar dkur bsti byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams kyis/ nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrub ste/ rgya mtsho'i chen por zhugs pa dang / 
104a1('dul ba): de rnams gru bo che ban pud med par rlung gi shugs kyi sing ga la'i gling du phyin to// de nas snod rnams ma'os su phab ste/ rgyal po pho brang dang btsa
104a2('dul ba): yang mi ring ba zhig tu brang btab po// de rnams kyis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ched du brjod pa dang / pha rol 'gro byed dang / bden pa mthong ba dang / gnas brtan gyi tshig
104a3('dul ba): su bcad pa dang / gnas brtan ma'i tshig su bcad pa dang / ri gnas kyi tshig su bcad pa dang / thub pa'i tshigasu bcad pa dang / don gyi tshems kyi mdo sde rnams rgyas pa
104a4('dul ba): 'dzin pa la zhugs pa/ mu tig can khyim gyi nang na 'dug pas skar khung nas thos nas/ nga nas de ngas rgyal ba la smras pa/ lha yul dbus kyi tshong pa dge mchis nas
104a5('dul ba): tshig snyan por len to// rgyal pos blon po dag la bsgrib// shes ldan dag gla mkhan rnams khug shig/ de rnams bkug pa dang / mu tig can gyis smras
104a6('dul ba): pa/ shes ldan dag yul dbus kyi rol mo tsa 'dra ba/ kho mos mnyan gyis long shig/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ lha mo bdag cag ni rol mo mkhan ma lags te
104a7('dul ba): bdag cag ni mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rlung gi shugs kyis 'dir mchis pa lags te/ bdag cag gis mtshan mo'i mthun tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi gsung bton to// mu
104a8('dul ba): tshig can gyis sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas snying dga' bas ba spu thams cad zing zhes byed de/ de ngo mtshar skyes nas dris pa/ sangs rgya
104b1('dul ba): shes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid can smra bar brtsams te/ lnga mo shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ring ngos dang nye ba chu bosal
104b2('dul ba): ldan shing rnga'i 'gram drang song ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ste/ de bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams dang / lngas mkha' rnams kyis/ gal
104b3('dul ba): te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur no// 'bar lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par
104b4('dul ba): gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rnga rin po che dang / nor bu rin
104b5('dul ba): bai ra dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che'o// de la bu dpa' ba rtul bong ba yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan
104b6('dul ba): pa pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ sdong yang tshang bar 'gyur zhing / de brgya mtsho la thugs pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid rang
104b7('dul ba): pa med cing mtshon gyis mnga' ba med la/ chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas/ legs par bab te gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te sma dang kha spu breg te gos ngur smrig bgos
104b8('dul ba): nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya
105a1('dul ba): bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan te/ de lta bu ni sangs rgyas nas bgyi ba lag so// mu rig can gyis smras pa/ 
105a2('dul ba): gang gi tshe khyed cag yul du 'dong ba der che kho mo la sbron cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lnga lo bka' bzhin 'tshal/ sbran par bgyi'o// ji tsam na de rnams yul du
105a3('dul ba): 'dong ba'i dus la bab nas/ de rnams kyis mu tig can la sbran pa dang / nges bcom ldan 'das la yi ge gsol pa/ lnga dang lha min mi yis phyag bgyis pa// skye dang
105a4('dul ba): snyun dang bsnyengs las ngas byung zhing // gtso bo grag pa rgya mer rab grags pa// drang srong bdud rtsi'i cha las thugs rjes gnong // zhes gsol to// de nas yi ge da
105a5('dul ba): tshong pa de rnams kyi khyer nas/ rims kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa/ nga/ lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / 
105a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'arol te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams kyis/ 
105a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa seng ga la'i gling na/ sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo des mchid yi ge gsol pa 'di lag so// bcom ldan
105a8('dul ba): 'das kyis/ mu tig can 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas nyid kyis blangs te/ blags so// blabrags nas bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe khyed cag slar 'dong bar gyur pa de
105b1('dul ba): nga'i snyan du gsol cig btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo // de nas zong
105b2('dul ba): bsgyur te bsgyur ba'i zong thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mchi na/ bdag cag gis mu tog can
105b3('dul ba): pa dzaM skad bag+h+nAM/ bka' stsal par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu legs par bye dor byas pa'i ras dang / ri mo mkhan dag khug cig// de rnams
105b4('dul ba): kyis ras dang ri me mkhan dag bkug nas phul ba dang / bcom lnga na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras la pon/ na gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan thos
105b5('dul ba): shig/ ri mo mkhan rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar brtsams pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa yin
105b6('dul ba): bas ri mo mkhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i gzugs brnyan bri bar ma nus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras ston cig dang 'di gang ngo // 
105b7('dul ba): nga rnams kyis ras bstan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gtang ba la ri mo mkhan rnams kyis chen sna tshogs kyis rgyas par byaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
105b8('dul ba): sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi 'og tu gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / bslabs pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yon lag bcu gnyis/ pi lugs dang
106a1('dul ba): mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bris// gong du ni tshig su bcad pa gnyis so// brtsam par
106a2('dul ba): bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ri gzhom par bya// gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas
106a3('dul ba): chos 'das 'di la spyod 'gyur ba// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ sdug bsngal tha mar byed par gyur ces bris nas/ sing ga la'i rgyal po la bka' yog spang / 
106a4('dul ba): mar po zas pa/ ngas mr-i tig cad la skye su bskur ba yin gyis/ khyod kyis des phyogs yangs shing rgya bar sing ga pa'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsdus la btu
106a5('dul ba): bsti chen pos ras 'di khrom shig/ tshong pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gal ta mu tig ca na 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku
106a6('dul ba): gzugs brlan yino zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te 'og ma 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na/ 'di dag ni gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / lugs
106a7('dul ba): dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gro bar 'jug pa dang / ldog pa'o// 'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
106a8('dul ba): brgyang po yino// zhes brjod par bya'o// gas gong ma 'di ma yin zhes 'dren sgri bar bya ba yon te gang zhig skyab su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams grangs te lugs
106b1('dul ba): dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'thung ba 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsoms par bdud rtsi tshogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thob nas
106b2('dul ba): sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mnya
106b3('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas dge mtshan dang bkri shis dang / bde legasu gyur pa dag byas te/ zong khyer nas sing ga la'i gling du song ste rim
106b4('dul ba): gyis sing ga la'i gling du phyin nas/ lam gyis du ba pa ngal sos te/ rgyal po'i drung du song nas/ rkang pa gnyis pa btugs te yi ge byi na// rgyal pos yi ge ba
106b5('dul ba): te sngags nas grong khyer de rdo ba dang gseg ma dang // gyo mo gsal nas/ tsan dan gyis dus chag chag bdag/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sbreng / dar gyis chun
106b6('dul ba): 'phyang mang po bdags/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag/ me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ sing ga la'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsags nas/ 
106b7('dul ba): nas bkur bsti chen po byas te/ grong khyer gyi dbusu rin po che sna bzhi las byis pa'i seng ge'i khri ba shams te/ ras bye ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen pos/ sangs
106b8('dul ba): rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo zhes gsang bstod de smraso// de nas rgyal po'i bu mo pu tig can dad pa drag pos gangang pa'i snying gis ba spu zing zhes byed
107a1('dul ba): cing mig mchi mas gang bas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ tshong ba rnams la dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ci yin/ de rnams kyi smra bar brtsams
107a2('dul ba): pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan lag so// 'og ma 'di dag ci yin/ 'di ni gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / lug
107a3('dul ba): dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par byung ba 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o// 'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i lam
107a4('dul ba): yan lag brgyad pa lag so// gong ma 'di ci yin spro bar ba gyi ba lags te/ gang zhig skabasu song nas/ bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blangs te/ lugs dang 'thun pa
107a5('dul ba): dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'di la rtog cing ba rtson 'grus brtsom pa de bad rtsi rtogs pa'i
107a6('dul ba): lam thob nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur pa lag so// de nas mu tig can gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa/ lugs dang
107a7('dul ba): 'thun pa dang lugs dang mi 'thun pa bsam par brtsams te/ ji srid lan gsum ma zlas pa dor bar du nges 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse me nyi shu mthe ba ya shes
107a8('dul ba): rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas tshig su bcad pas smras pa/ ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ 
107b1('dul ba): shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs pas// gang la 'di 'dra'i gsol mnga' ba// sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshalo// ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// lta ba'i ring
107b2('dul ba): drungs phyung ste// lta ba'i zug rngu sel mdzad pa// sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes tshigasu bcad pa smras nas/ tshong pa rnams la 'di skad ces smraso// shes ldan
107b3('dul ba): dge khyed cag nam 'dong ba de'i tshe kho mo la sbron cig/ de nas tshong pa rnams kyis zong rnams bsgyur te/ bsgyur ba'i zong rnams khyer nas mu tig can gyi drung du song ste/ 
107b4('dul ba): lha mo bdag cag ni mchin/ bdag gis ci zhig bgyi ba/ ba ka' stsal par gsol/ des smras pa/ kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
107b5('dul ba): mgo bos phyag 'tshal la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ spyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba dang ska nyams dang
107b6('dul ba): ldan nam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes zhus la/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bgyi ba gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad/ 
107b7('dul ba): bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas/ sems cad dmyal ba dang dang 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams las ri rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams
107b8('dul ba): bzhag/ 'khor ba las ni brgyang bsrings/ khrig dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bi las ni sgral/ ngan song sgo na bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye khro
108a1('dul ba): ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyis rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
108a2('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phagaso// mngon par 'phag so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skabasu
108a3('dul ba): mchi yis/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ dang slan chad ji srid mtsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabasu mchi bar dang na mngon par dang lag so zhes gsol la/ 
108a4('dul ba): mu tig phra gsum po 'di khyer ma chog ni sangs rgyas la/ ma cig ni chos la/ tshe gcig ni dge 'dun la phu lo cig/ de nas tshong pa de rnams kyis bong dang / skyes skur
108a5('dul ba): yang khyer te dong nas/ rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhabs gnyis la
108a6('dul ba): bdugs nas/ ji srid spring pa bzhin bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// btsun pa skyesu phul ba'i mu tig bre gsum po 'di lags te mu dge
108a7('dul ba): ma cig ni sangs rgyas la/ cha cig ni chos la/ che cig ni dge 'dun la phul lag so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa skyes 'jig
108a8('dul ba): nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis shAkya ming chen gyis mngag gzhug ma bsgying ma zhes bya ba/ nga las ches mngon nas song
108b1('dul ba): ba las/ lam kar ba drus mas bsad pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lag so// des ngal sems dang ba bskyed de shibs/ sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo mu tog can zhes bya
108b2('dul ba): bar gyur te/ bden pa mthong nas/ des skyes bskur ba 'di yin// 'di las sangs rgyas kyi skal pa gang yin pa des dri gtsang khang gi zhal zhal byos shig/ chos kyi gang yin
108b3('dul ba): pa de ni chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la'o// dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis mnyam par bgos shig/ dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thang
108b4('dul ba): gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mu tig can gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na bran mor gyur lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ nges
108b5('dul ba): na rgyal po phyug po'i rigasu skyes shing bden pa mthong bar ba gyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mu tig can 'di nyid kyis
108b6('dul ba): las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/ 'ong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi bza' bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ mu tig can
108b7('dul ba): 'di nyid kyis pas byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam
108b8('dul ba): bar smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing
109a1('dul ba): bsag pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni
109a2('dul ba): chud mi za 'ang tshogs dus dang // rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur pa nyid// dge slong dag sngon byang ba// bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i
109a3('dul ba): tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ 'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na mang po
109a4('dul ba): dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung / sa bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma tha' dag mdzangasas
109a5('dul ba): bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du/ bA ra na ser phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po kri kris
109a6('dul ba): de'i sku dri zhim po'i shing thams cad kyis spungs te/ spungs nas bkur sti chen pos bsregs te/ mau de 'o mas bsad nas sku gdung de rnams gser gyi bum par blug
109a7('dul ba): lem po che'i bzhi mdor rin po sna bzhi las byung ba'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du dpag tshod byed pa zhig brtsigs nas/ dus
109a8('dul ba): chong chen po btsug so// bA ra na se na tshong dpon phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongasu gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyis
109b1('dul ba): bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de
109b2('dul ba): bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed kyang dal bu po yang med/ bu mo yang med nas/ de lag pa 'gram pa la btad nas/ bdag go khyim danor pal
109b3('dul ba): po che bsags kyang bdag la bu po yang mdo/ bu mo yang med pas/ bdag shi nas bdog pa thams cad bu medo zhes byas te/ rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam
109b4('dul ba): nas sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa de la dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / grogs po dang mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / lhas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mnyes par
109b5('dul ba): byos shig dang / khyod la bu yod par 'gyuraro// de bu med da bu mngon par 'dod pas/ zhi ba dang / nu lnga dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs
109b6('dul ba): pa gzhan yang lnga khyad par can rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lba
109b7('dul ba): gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos 'thun pa dang / rtag tu rje su 'brang ba'i lnga la yang gsol ba 'dab so// 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyus
109b8('dul ba): po dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur zhes 'jig rten nang skang du grags pa yod / da mang de lA ma yin te/ gal de de ltar 'gyur na ni re re la yang dper na 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal
110a1('dul ba): bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gnas gsum mngon tu gyur pa las/ bu po dang bu mo skyes par 'gyur te gnas gsum gang zhe na/ pa dang ma
110a2('dul ba): gnyis chags par gyur cing / lhan cig 'das pa dang / ma mangs rung bar gyur cing / zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri zanye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/ gnas nga gsum mngon
110a3('dul ba): gyur pa las bu po dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba yin na nges bu yod pa'i las ma byas pas/ ngas na de la bu po dang bu mo med do// ci tsam na de nad kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa dang sdong bu
110a4('dul ba): da lo ma dang / me togs dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang / de'i nang zhi bar ma gyur to// de nas de'i rlung mas bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim na nor pa la
110a5('dul ba): po che bsags pa ni bdag la bu po yang med bu mo yang med la bdag gi khyim thab 'di ni 'chi bar 'gyur gyi swa/ da ni gal te 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags
110a6('dul ba): ma blangs na/ nor zas 'di thams cad bdag la bu med do zhes byas nas/ rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyuraro snyam na/ de'i mu tig gi do shal brgya stong rib mgul thogs
110a7('dul ba): bangs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchad rten de la dri dang byug pas byugs nas mchod pa byas te 'atags nas/ dad pa drag pos drung du gtugs te/ smon lam
110a8('dul ba): bdab pa ston pa'i chos yongasu btang ba dang / sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ongs bdag phyug po'i rig su skye zhing yon tan 'di lta bu yang thob cing / ston pa 'di lta bu ma
110b1('dul ba): par byed kyi/ mi mnyes par ma gyur cig ces byaso// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong dpon gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni mu tig can 'di nyid yin te/ 'a
110b2('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ phyug pa'i rigasu skyes shing
110b3('dul ba): btsas pa na mu tig gi char bab po// nga'i bstan pa yang dang bskyes pas 'jig rigs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
110b4('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas// gzhan yang tshong dpon nor ma da du bsags pa de'i rung bar gyur pa ra/ de na des dbang phyug gi grags pas rgya gas ras
110b5('dul ba): yul du gnas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la tshig tu bran mo'i bu zhes kun tu smras pa/ de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa sa tshe rabs mang por bran mor gyur to// dge slong
110b6('dul ba): ngag de lnga bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin zhing / gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dka ra la/ 'dren ma rnams
110b7('dul ba): kyi ni 'dren ma yin no// de bas na dge slong dag gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la gcig tu dkar ba'i las kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge
110b8('dul ba): gleng dag khyed kyis de lta bul bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi ma gang lo yin pa de ni/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la yin zhes gsungs pa dang / ngal
111a1('dul ba): mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde mtha' dag 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa
111a2('dul ba): ni kho bo cag dbang ngo // 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nang gi mdzod srung zhing kho bo cag 'dul ba mtha' dag 'dzin pas/ 
111a3('dul ba): bo cag ches 'dzin pa yin pas/ rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dngango // ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni mdo sde dang / 'dul ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spri
111a4('dul ba): mtshan nyid 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo zhes/ de na mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams
111a5('dul ba): 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang thab mo dang 'gye da ba byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
111a6('dul ba): ngag ma 'thab shig/ 'chang ma 'dra shig/ 'thab mo ma byed cig/ ma 'gyed cig/ dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni rtsod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang / 
111a7('dul ba): gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod pa'o// 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun sna tshogasu smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi
111a8('dul ba): 'phrod par smra ga/ mi mthun pa kun tu mi dga' ga/ rgyud gcig tu ma gyur pa gang yin pa de las brtan te 'thab pa dang / 'ching 'dru ba dang 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin
111b1('dul ba): pa 'di ni 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag
111b2('dul ba): bzhag pa gang yin pa de las brten nas 'thab pa dang mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// 
111b3('dul ba): ltung ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ ltung ba lnga ni ltung ba'i phung po lnga zhes bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang so sor gshegs
111b4('dul ba): par bya ba dang / nyes byas gang yin pa de las ba/ na nas/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru dang / 'thab mo da nga / 'gyid pa gang yin pa 'od ni ltung ba'i rtsod pa zhes bya
111b5('dul ba): bya ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gyi bya ba gsol pa dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las brten nas/ 'thab
111b6('dul ba): pa dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gying pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing / 'gyed
111b7('dul ba): pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa bo ni ci yin zhe na/ 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug dang / 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi ste/ 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug gang zhar/ 'di ltar 'di ni la la khro ba yin ni
111b8('dul ba): len du 'dzin pa yin te khro zhing khon tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni/ ston pa la bkur bsti mi byed/ bla mar mi byed ri mor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed do// ston pa la bkar bstim
112a1('dul ba): / byas bla mar ma byas/ ri mor ma byas/ mchod par ma byas pas chos ma mthong // chos ma mthong bas dge sbyong gi tshul lam blta'o// dge sbyong
112a2('dul ba): tshul la mi ldan/ dge 'dun la 'di lta bu'i 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa byin par byedado// 'thab pa dang / mchong 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyod pa
112a3('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa ma yin pa dang / skye bo mang po me gnod pa dang / skye bo mang po la sdug bsngal ba dang / lnga dang mi rnams la mi phan pa dang / gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar
112a4('dul ba): byed pa yin no// dge sbyong dag gal te khyod kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lnga bu nang gi'am/ phyi rol gyi yang rung ma spangs par yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag ldan cig 'dren zhing / kun
112a5('dul ba): dga' ba dang / 'gyeng po med pas 'dun pa drag pa dang 'tsho na 'grus dang / 'bang pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / ma zlog pa'i dran pa dang / shes pa'in gyis jim
112a6('dul ba): 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid spangs kyi bar du brtson par bya'o// de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang spong bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba
112a7('dul ba): de lta bu nang gi yang rung / phyi'i yang rung / legs par spangaso par yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig 'thun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med pas/ 'dun pa drag
112a8('dul ba): pe dang brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi zlogs pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ci tsam rtsod pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyir kyang mi 'byung bar rdzo/ 
112b1('dul ba): par bya ste/ de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyeng ba'i rtsa ba de yang dag par legs par gsal bas/ phyis skye bar mi 'gyuraro// 'dul ba bzhi// / bam po don brgyad pa/ 
112b2('dul ba): khro ning khong du 'dzin pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'chab cing tshig pa dang / phrag dog byed cing ser sna can dang / g.yo byed cing skye can dang / ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa yang de dang 'dra/ 
112b3('dul ba): gzhan yang 'di na la la rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yin zhing 'chab pa'i 'dzin pa dang / smras pa la dang na then byed pa yin te/ rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa 'chal pa
112b4('dul ba): 'dzin pa/ smras pa la dang na then byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ ston pa la bkur bsti mi byed/ bla mar mi byed/ ri bor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed do// de ston pa la bkur bstim pas/ 
112b5('dul ba): bla mar ma byas/ ri mor ma byas/ mchod par ma byas par chos mi mthong ngo // chos mi mthong bas dge slong gi tshul la mi lta'o// dge sbyong gi tshul la mi ltan/ dag 'dun
112b6('dul ba): la de lta bu'i 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang / 'thab mo dang 'gyed pa 'byin par byedado// 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa ni/ skye bo mang po la pan
112b7('dul ba): pa ma yin pa dang / skye bo mang po la gnod pa dang / skye bo mang po la sdug bsngal ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la mi phan pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar byed pa yi'o// dge
112b8('dul ba): gleng dag gal la khyod kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa bdalta bu reng gi yang rung phyi'i 'ang dum spangs par yang dag par mthong na/ del khyed cag ldan cig 'thum zhing kun tu dag 'bang
113a1('dul ba): 'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bang ba dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mau zlogs pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis rdo lnga pa 'byed
113a2('dul ba): nga'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid spong ba'i bar du brtson par bya ste/ daltar na khyod kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba spong bar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu/ na
113a3('dul ba): gi yang rang / phyi'i 'ang rung legs par spangs par yang dag par mthong nade la khyed cag lhan cig 'thun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyod pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang / ljon
113a4('dul ba): 'gras dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi thogs pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ci nas kyang 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyis kyang mi 'byung bar brtson
113a5('dul ba): par bya ste/ de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang dag par gsal bas/ phyis skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug ces bya'o// 'bed par
113a6('dul ba): byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos so zhe'am chos ma yin no na'am 'dal ba'o zhes 'am 'dul ba ma yin no zhe'am/ ltung ba'o zhe 'am/ ltung ba ma yin pa'o zhe 'am/ 
113a7('dul ba): ba'am yang ba 'am/ lhag ma dang bcas pa 'am/ lhag ma med pa 'am/ bshags par bya ba'am/ bsdum par bya ba 'am/ nyes par bshad par gtogs pa 'am/ legs par bca
113a8('dul ba): par gtogs pa ste/ 'di dag ni 'byed par byed pa'i gni bcu bzhi nas bya'o// dge slong dog 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin ning / 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa rang yin// dge slong dag
113b1('dul ba): gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa de ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing / gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/ dge 'dun gang mas ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag
113b2('dul ba): mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag bzhag pa gang yin pa pa de la brtan nas/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang / 'thab mo dang 'gyed pa gang yin pa ste/ dge slong dag gdams ngag
113b3('dul ba): mang pa'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni nga yin// dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing / ltung ba'i rtsod par
113b4('dul ba): rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/ ltung ba'i rigs lnga ni ltung ba'i ri gas dang ltung ba'i phung po zhes bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so
113b5('dul ba): sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byaso// gzhan ma nga lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin sems kyi ma yin pa yang yod/ ngag gi yid gyi lus kyi ma yin sa
113b6('dul ba): kyi ma yin pa'ang yod/ lus kyi dang sems kyi yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin pa yang yod/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi yin pa yang yod// lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin/ sa
